Legal_Issue: Whether the Board erred in rejecting the Applicant's LP membership card as fraudulent without forensic analysis
Outcome: Application for judicial review dismissed, no questions certified

Document_Fraud: Alleged tampering with LP membership card

Legal_Issue: Whether the Board erred in rejecting the LP membership card as fraudulent without forensic analysis

Remedy_Requested: Certification of question or allowance of judicial review
Defendant_Behavior: Presented document with incomplete seal, claimed political persecution
Assessment_Factor: Authenticity of membership card, completeness of official seal
